name: @dao-xyz/borsh-rpc
description: Borsh-based RPC over typed messages and decorators

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.postbuild: echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' | npx json > lib/cjs/package.json && echo '{"type":"module"}' | npx json > lib/esm/package.json && rimraf lib/esm/__tests__ && rimraf lib/cjs/__tests__
